text: If a prov eg #PEI were to use simple age criteria, 75+ then 65+, instead of #LTC & named target groups -> then random lotto to invite winners for #vaccine would be fairer (& possible faster) #peipoli #peinews #covid19 @dennyking @bradtrivers #cdnpoli #nspoli #nbpoli vax crawl-out https://t.co/kLnu7kX2b1
